content: snoods and cowls are always cosy on cold days this classic is crocheted and is very simple to construct crocheted in chunky/bulky weight yarn with a 6mm hook this is a good project for less experienced crocheters this snood is crocheted in the round with the foundation 1st row worked flat designed to fit an adult snuggly around the neck please note instructions use uk/english terminology table with us terminology is included
